turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I wanted to get some pizzas delivered. does Bella Chino Bella Luna has gluten free crust?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey. Can you get me some Can you help me order some pizzas from there so so I can get those delivered? Yeah. The I want three small pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i sure can. what would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. did you want those all with gluten free crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, you got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The first one, I just want mushroom and tomato. For the second, I'd like a meatball and mushroom. And then for the last one, I want double cheese. And that's it. Nothing else.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome. and for the toppings?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, there is no meatball option for toppings. did you want something else instead.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do you having anything that's similar to meatballs? I'm really in the mood for meatball.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, there's ground beef.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How about instead of ground beef, do you have lingui√ßa?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry i don't see that on the menu either.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. We'll just make it ground beef, then. Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: my apologies for the inconvenienc. i'm sure it'll be just as tasty. the total for 3 small pizzas, all with gluten free crust, 1 mushroom and tomatoes, 1 ground beef and mushroom, and 1 double cheese pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, go ahead. And then how long do you think it will take to be delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've submitted the order. it'll b delivered in about 45 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that will be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, enjoy
